Articles.Content: After roughly 500 hours in the game I've somewhat lost interest. An update would probably bring me back to check it out ... but when??? It's been quite a while.

Renaissance03321: What the heck am I looking at?! When did this patch happen?!

Whackjob: "Now". You're looking at "now", sir. Everything that happens now [indicates himself and Renaissance03321] is happening "now".

Renaissance03321: What happened to "then"?

Whackjob: We passed "then".

Renaissance03321: When?

Whackjob: Just now. Were at "now," now.

Renaissance03321: Go back to "then"!

Whackjob: When?

Renaissance03321: Now!

Whackjob: Now?

Renaissance03321: Now!

Whackjob: I can't.

Renaissance03321: Why?!

Whackjob: We missed it.

Renaissance03321: When?!

Whackjob: Just now.

Renaissance03321: ... When will "then" be "now"?

Whackjob: Soon.

Rules, gotta read em all!

2. Messages

2.1 Definition of message

A message includes any and all means a user has available to communicate with other members. This includes but is not limited to forum posts and private messages, irc chat messages, avatars, signatures, usernames and general profile information.

2.3 Other forbidden messages

Messages that inquire about release dates for future versions of KSP.
